review: As a Netflix and Hulu Plus subscriber, the Chromecast has replaced my Xbox 360 as the primary media player that I use to access these services.The setup took less than five minutes and full exploration of the Chromecast capability took approximately 15 minutes. There are some services like Youtube, Netflix, and Hulu that have native Chromecast capability, which allows a person to cast in high definition any content from these services. Chromecast's killer capability is that the streaming can occur wirelessly from either a phone, tablet, or laptop.In fact, the Chromecast has provided true purpose to any tablet as solely a media-streaming device in that as the tablet is streaming, a user can still access their smartphone or laptop. Further, if there is already a device streaming to a Chromecast, any person on the wireless network that the Chromecast is using can interrupt the current media streaming and begin casting from another device; for example, if a tablet is casting Netflix, a smartphone-user can interrupt and immediately cast from Youtube. Personally, I love the ability to cast from my Google Chrome tab, which displays anything in my browser on the screen; I can finally surf the web on my laptop and view it on my large flat screen.This device is highly recommended as a cheap gift that both a novice and a savvy technology user can thoroughly enjoy.

review: I didn't really know much about what the Chromecast was when I got it and expected more of an "android on a stick" or "chromeos on a stick" when I got it. Unfortunately it's not much more than a way for you to show stuff from your mobile device and then tie up your mobile device showing it. The screen casting I did didn't really fit properly and while I can see how it might be convenient sometimes, or if you don't have a HTPC, it just wasn't what I want in an HDMI stick.

review: This is a great device to get media on your TV without to much fuss. It was so easy to setup.I like the fact it does all the heavy lifting and puts minimal strain on my mobile device, the queue feature (youtube) is a nice touch.Occasionally it would drop the signal but it's only happened a handful of times, I'm sure google is working on this. New apps are being added frequently, I would recommend this to anyone that has a smartphone or laptop. Great value for money!
